{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=AIR-AP340 |revision=(AIR-AP342E2CUS) |asin=B00005164R |fcc_date=03/20/2000 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=access point |fcc_id=LDK102035 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Motorola |cpu1_model=MPC860;XPC860DTZP50B3; |cpu1_cspeed=50 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F160C3BA110 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC4M16A2-8E C |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Cisco AIR-LMC342 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Cisco |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Crystal |eth_chip2_model=CS8952 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=tsunami |default_ssid_regex=^tsunami$ |default_ip=10.0.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:40:96 |oui_eth=00:40:96 }} {{TagLine|Cisco Aironet 340 Series Access Point}} :''2.4GHz DS 11Mbps Ethernet Access Point''
The CPU in this device is part XPC860DTZP50B3.
*[http://forums.wi-fiplanet.com/archive/index.php/t-773.html Resetting the device to factory defaults] *[http://www.seattlewireless.net/CiscoAironet340 On '''Seattle Wireless''']
